title: Kuo: Apple 27-Inch Mini-LED External Display Still Planned, Mass Production Slated for 2024 to 2025
content:
Apple's rumored mini-LED 27-inch external display is still in the works and will reach mass production in 2024 or early 2025, according to analyst Ming-Chi Kuo.


On Twitter, Kuo said that the device will boast "all the features one would expect from a high-end monitor."

The claim comes in stark contrast to a report from display analyst Ross Young, who yesterday said that Apple had "killed off" the display for unknown reasons.

More to follow...
Tag: Ming-Chi Kuo

This article, "Kuo: Apple 27-Inch Mini-LED External Display Still Planned, Mass Production Slated for 2024 to 2025" first appeared on MacRumors.com
